platform.title: The iThing Platform
platform.subtitle: One unified IoT platform powering six industry solutions — with enterprise-grade reliability, security, and scalability.

connectivity.title: Multi-Protocol Connectivity
connectivity.desc: BLE, RFID, UWB, GPS, 4G/5G, WiFi, LoRaWAN, MQTT, and Modbus — connect any device, any protocol.

analytics.title: AI & Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Machine learning that detects faults before they happen with 85%+ accuracy. Predictive insights, not just data.

realtime.title: Real-Time Monitoring
realtime.desc: 100–500 Hz sensor sampling with on-device processing for sub-second response to critical events.

integration.title: Enterprise Integration
integration.desc: Native connectors for maintenance (CMMS), enterprise planning (ERP), medical records (EMR), and warehouse (WMS) systems.

scale.title: Massive Scale
scale.desc: Cloud infrastructure supporting 50,000+ simultaneously tracked objects per deployment — grows with you.

mobile.title: Control From Anywhere
mobile.desc: Full operational control from any device — smartphone, tablet, or desktop — anytime, anywhere.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.desc: End-to-end encryption, role-based access, audit logs, and full compliance with PDPL and international data protection standards.

edge.title: On-Device Processing
edge.desc: Data is processed locally at the controller or smart gateway — no cloud round-trip needed — ensuring instant response for time-critical applications.

usecases.title: Use Cases
usecases.subtitle: Real-world applications of the iThing platform across industries.

items.title: 5-Star Hotel Chain — Room Automation
items.desc: 300-room hotel deployed iHotel across all floors. Energy bills reduced by 38%, guest service response time cut from 12 minutes to under 2 minutes via in-room SOS and digital MUR requests.

items.title: Shopping Mall — Centralised Building Control
items.desc: A regional mall with 180,000 sqm deployed iBMS for HVAC, lighting, and access. Achieved 31% reduction in energy spend and cut facility management headcount needed by 40%.
items.result: 31% energy reduction · 40% fewer FM staff needed

items.title: Food Processing Plant — Early Fault Detection
items.desc: Manufacturer deployed vibration and temperature sensors on 120 production machines. iFactory predicted 14 failures over 6 months before they occurred, saving an estimated SAR 2.4M in unplanned downtime.

items.title: Desert Farm — Precision Irrigation
items.desc: A 500-hectare farm in the Eastern Province installed soil sensors and automated drip irrigation. Water consumption dropped 43% while tomato yield improved 27% in the first season.

items.title: Pharmaceutical Cold Chain — Temperature Monitoring
items.desc: Distributor tracks 800 active shipments daily. Temperature breaches detected in real time, reducing product loss by 91%. Full cold chain traceability provided for regulatory reporting.

items.title: Private Hospital — Medical Asset Tracking
items.desc: 280-bed hospital deployed RTLS for 1,200 tagged assets. Average equipment search time dropped from 22 minutes to under 90 seconds, recovering 4+ hours of nurse time per shift.

footer.tagline: Purpose-built IoT solutions for hospitality, buildings, industrial, agriculture, logistics, and healthcare.

ihotel.shortDesc: Complete IoT platform for hotels, resorts, and BnBs — from room automation to guest experience management.
ihotel.description: iHotel transforms any accommodation into a smart, connected property. Control lighting, AC, curtains, and door locks from a unified dashboard. Monitor energy consumption in real time, manage reservations via a built-in PMS, and let guests control their own room via a QR-code-linked self-service portal.
features: Room automation — lights, AC, curtains, blinds, door lock
Live occupancy heatmap across all floors
Guest self-service portal via QR code link
Real-time telemetry: temperature, humidity, CO₂, motion

ibms.shortDesc: Building Management System for commercial spaces, malls, government buildings, and campuses.
ibms.description: iBMS delivers centralised control over every building system — HVAC, lighting, access control, energy metering, and elevator monitoring — from a single intelligent dashboard. Designed for facility managers who demand maximum uptime with minimum operational cost.
features: Energy metering per zone, floor & tenant

ifactory.shortDesc: IoT platform for manufacturing, quality control, predictive maintenance, and industrial BMS.
ifactory.description: iFactory connects every machine, sensor, and production line into one intelligent industrial ecosystem. Detect anomalies before they become failures, track quality in real time, and optimise throughput with actionable AI-driven insights — all while maintaining full safety and compliance oversight.
features: Predictive maintenance with 85%+ fault detection accuracy
Worker safety & environmental monitoring (gas, dust, temp)

iagrix.shortDesc: IoT platform for soil monitoring, smart irrigation, crop automation, and agricultural AI insights.
iagrix.description: iAgrix brings precision agriculture to every farm — from vast open fields to climate-controlled greenhouses. Monitor soil moisture, temperature, electrical conductivity, and pH in real time. Automate irrigation per crop type, cut water consumption significantly, and receive AI-powered recommendations tailored to each crop to maximise yield.
features: Soil parameter monitoring: moisture, temp, EC, pH, NPK
Remote farm management via mobile app

irtls.shortDesc: Real-time logistics platform for fleet management, cold chain monitoring, goods tracking, and route intelligence.
irtls.description: iRTLS delivers complete supply chain visibility from warehouse to last mile. Track trucks, containers, and high-value goods using GPS, BLE, RFID, and UWB. Monitor temperature throughout cold chains, optimise delivery routes, and receive instant alerts for deviations, tampering, or unexpected delays.
features: Multi-technology tracking: GPS + BLE + RFID + UWB
Cold chain temperature monitoring & breach alerts

imedical.shortDesc: Healthcare IoT platform for patient monitoring, medical asset tracking, and hospital operations management.
imedical.description: iMedical connects patients, clinical staff, and medical assets across the hospital ecosystem. Track critical equipment in seconds with indoor RTLS, monitor patient vitals remotely, automate clinical workflows, and ensure full regulatory compliance — all from a unified clinical operations dashboard.
features: Indoor RTLS: real-time location of staff, patients & equipment
Nurse call & emergency response system integration
